biotools.summary: BARS is a statistical method that bridges the gap between single-locus and haplotype-based tests of association. It is based on the non-parametric regression techniques embodied by Bayesian Adaptive Regression Splines.

bioschemas.name: BARS
bioschemas.summary: BARS is a statistical method that bridges the gap between single-locus and haplotype-based tests of association. It is based on the non-parametric regression techniques embodied by Bayesian Adaptive Regression Splines.
